00243     public static function createTable(){
00244         $sql = "CREATE TABLE `".DBPropositionStage::$TABLE_NAME."` (  
00245                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE."` INT(11) NOT NULL  auto_increment,  
00246                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_MAITRE_STAGE."` INT(11) NOT NULL  ,  
00247                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_CONTACT."` INT(11) NOT NULL  ,  
00248                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DOMAINE."` VARCHAR(255) NULL  ,  
00249                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INTITULE."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00250                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_SUJET."` TEXT NULL  ,  
00251                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DEBUT."` DATE NULL  ,  
00252                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_FIN."` DATE NULL  ,  
00253                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_TECHNO."` VARCHAR(255) NULL  ,  
00254                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_ETUDIANT_PROP."` INT(11) NULL  ,  
00255                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INDEMNITE_PROP."` TEXT NULL  ,
00256                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ETAT."` ENUM('".DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_ATTENTE_VALIDATION."','"
00257                                                                          .DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_VALIDEE."','"
00258                                                                          .DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_REFUSEE."','"
00259                                                                          .DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_TERMINEE."') NOT NULL  ,  
00260                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MOTIF_REFUS."` VARCHAR(255) NULL  ,  
00261                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MAIL_RESPONSABLE_PROPOSITION."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00262                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PROMO."` INT(11) NOT NULL  ,  
00263                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_CREATION."` DATETIME NOT NULL  ,  
00264                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DERNIERE_MODIFICATION."` DATETIME NULL  ,  
00265                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_VALIDATION."` DATETIME NULL  ,  
00266                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_REFUS."` DATETIME NULL  ,  
00267                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_TERMINAISON."` DATETIME NULL  ,  
00268                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DESC_TECHNO_PROP."` TEXT NULL  ,
00269                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_ENTREPRISE."` INT(11) NOT NULL  ,
00270                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NOM_MAITRE_STAGE."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00271                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PRENOM_MAITRE_STAGE."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00272                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NOM_CONTACT."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00273                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PRENOM_CONTACT."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,  
00274                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_RAISON_SOCIALE_ENTREPRISE."` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL  ,
00275                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_CANDIDATURE."` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0' COMMENT 'Permet de stocker le nombre de réponse à cette proposition',
00276                             `".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_FICHE."` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0' COMMENT 'Permet de savoir le nombre de fiche de stage résultant de la proposition',
00277                             PRIMARY KEY (`".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE."`)
00278                 ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;";
00279         
00280         
00281         foreach(explode(";", $sql) as $query)
00282         {
00283             if($query != "")
00284                 DBConnector::getDBConnector()->executeQuery($query);
00285         }
00286     }

00317         public static function createRecord($maitreStage, $contact, $domaine, $intitule, $sujet, $dateDebut, $dateFin, $techno, $nbEtudiantProp, $indemniteProp, $etat, $motifRefus, $mailResponsableProposition, $promo, $dateCreation, $dateDerniereModification, $dateValidation, $dateRefus, $dateTerminaison, $descTechnoProp, $entreprise, $nbCandidature=0, $nbFiche=0){

00319         assert(($contact == null) || ($contact instanceof DBContactEtp));
00320         assert(($entreprise == null) || ($entreprise instanceof DBEntreprise));
00321         $sql = "INSERT INTO ".DBPropositionStage::$TABLE_NAME." ("

00341                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DESC_TECHNO_PROP.", "

00343                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NOM_MAITRE_STAGE.", "
00344                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PRENOM_MAITRE_STAGE.", "

00346                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PRENOM_CONTACT.", "

00348                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_CANDIDATURE.", "
00349                             .DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_FICHE." "
00350                             .") VALUES ("
00351                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt(($maitreStage==null?-1:$maitreStage->getIdContact())).", "
00352                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt(($contact==null?-1:$contact->getIdContact())).", "
00353                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($domaine)).", "
00354                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($intitule)).", "
00355                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($sujet)).", "
00356                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateDebut).", "
00357                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateFin).", "
00358                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($techno)).", "
00359                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject($nbEtudiantProp).", "
00360                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($indemniteProp)).", "
00361                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($etat)).", "
00362                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($motifRefus)).", "
00363                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($mailResponsableProposition)).", "
00364                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($promo).", "
00365                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateCreation).", "
00366                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateDerniereModification).", "
00367                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateValidation).", "
00368                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateRefus).", "
00369                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateTerminaison).", "
00370                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($descTechnoProp)).", "
00371                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt(($entreprise==null?-1:$entreprise->getIdEntreprise())).", "
00372                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString(($maitreStage==null?"":$maitreStage->getNomContact()))).", "
00373                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString(($maitreStage==null?"":$maitreStage->getPrenomContact()))).", "
00374                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString(($contact==null?"":$contact->getNomContact()))).", "
00375                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString(($contact==null?"":$contact->getPrenomContact()))).", "
00376                             .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString(($entreprise==null?"":$entreprise->getRaisonsocialeEntreprise()))).", "
00377                                                         .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt(($nbCandidature)).", "
00378                                                         .DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt(($nbFiche))." "
00379                             .")";
00380         
00381         $id = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->executeQuery($sql);
00382         
00383         $obj = DBPropositionStage::getRecords($id);
00384         assert(count($obj) == 1);
00385         return $obj[0];
00386     }
00387 
00417         public static function getRecords($idPropositionStage="", $idMaitreStage="", $idContact="", $domaine="", $intitule="", $sujet="", $dateDebut="", $dateFin="", $techno="", $nbEtudiantProp="", $indemniteProp="", $etat="", $motifRefus="", $mailResponsableProposition="", $promo="", $dateCreation="", $dateDerniereModification="", $dateValidation="", $dateRefus="", $dateTerminaison="", $descTechnoProp="", $idEntreprise="", $nbCandidature="", $nbFiche=""){
00418         $sql = "SELECT * FROM ".DBPropositionStage::$TABLE_NAME." WHERE 1";
00419         
00420         if($idPropositionStage != "")
00421             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idPropositionStage);
00422         if($idMaitreStage != "")
00423             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_MAITRE_STAGE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idMaitreStage);
00424         if($idContact != "")
00425             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_CONTACT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idContact);
00426         if($domaine != "")
00427             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DOMAINE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($domaine));
00428         if($intitule != "")
00429             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INTITULE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($intitule));
00430         if($sujet != "")
00431             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_SUJET."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($sujet));
00432         if($dateDebut != "")
00433             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DEBUT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateDebut);
00434         if($dateFin != "")
00435             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_FIN."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateFin);
00436         if($techno != "")
00437             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_TECHNO."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($techno));
00438         if($nbEtudiantProp != "")
00439             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_ETUDIANT_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject($nbEtudiantProp);
00440         if($indemniteProp != "")
00441             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INDEMNITE_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($indemniteProp));
00442         if($etat != "")
00443             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ETAT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($etat));
00444         if($motifRefus != "")
00445             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MOTIF_REFUS."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($motifRefus));
00446         if($mailResponsableProposition != "")
00447             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MAIL_RESPONSABLE_PROPOSITION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($mailResponsableProposition));
00448         if($promo != "")
00449             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PROMO."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($promo);
00450         if($dateCreation != "")
00451             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_CREATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateCreation);
00452         if($dateDerniereModification != "")
00453             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DERNIERE_MODIFICATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateDerniereModification);
00454         if($dateValidation != "")
00455             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_VALIDATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateValidation);
00456         if($dateRefus != "")
00457             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_REFUS."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateRefus);
00458         if($dateTerminaison != "")
00459             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_TERMINAISON."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateTerminaison);
00460         if($descTechnoProp != "")
00461             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DESC_TECHNO_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($descTechnoProp));
00462         if($idEntreprise != "")
00463             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_ENTREPRISE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idEntreprise);
00464         if($nbCandidature != "")
00465             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_CANDIDATURE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($nbCandidature);
00466                 if($nbFiche != "")
00467             $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_FICHE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($nbFiche);
00468                         
00469         $res = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->executeQuery($sql);
00470         
00471         $return = array();
00472         $i=0;
00473         while($result = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->fetchArray($res)) {
00474             $return[$i] = new DBPropositionStage(
00475                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE],
00476                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_MAITRE_STAGE],
00477                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_CONTACT],
00478                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DOMAINE],
00479                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INTITULE],
00480                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_SUJET],
00481                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDate($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DEBUT]),
00482                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDate($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_FIN]),
00483                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_TECHNO],
00484                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_ETUDIANT_PROP],
00485                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INDEMNITE_PROP],
00486                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ETAT],
00487                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MOTIF_REFUS],
00488                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MAIL_RESPONSABLE_PROPOSITION],
00489                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PROMO],
00490                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDateTime($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_CREATION]),
00491                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDateTime($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DERNIERE_MODIFICATION]),
00492                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDateTime($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_VALIDATION]),
00493                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDateTime($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_REFUS]),
00494                                             DBConnector::getDBConnector()->decomputeDateTime($result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_TERMINAISON]),
00495                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DESC_TECHNO_PROP],
00496                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_ENTREPRISE],
00497                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_CANDIDATURE],
00498                                             $result[DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_FICHE]
00499                                         );
00500             
00501             $i++;
00502         }
00503         
00504         return $return;
00505     }

00536         public  function updateRecord($idMaitreStage, $idContact, $domaine, $intitule, $sujet, $dateDebut, $dateFin, $techno, $nbEtudiantProp, $indemniteProp, $etat, $motifRefus, $mailResponsableProposition, $promo, $dateCreation, $dateDerniereModification, $dateValidation, $dateRefus, $dateTerminaison, $descTechnoProp, $idEntreprise, $nbCandidature, $nbFiche){
00537         
00538                 $sql = "UPDATE ".DBPropositionStage::$TABLE_NAME." SET ";
00539         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_MAITRE_STAGE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idMaitreStage).",";
00540         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_CONTACT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idContact).",";
00541         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DOMAINE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($domaine)).",";
00542         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INTITULE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($intitule)).",";
00543         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_SUJET."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($sujet)).",";
00544         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DEBUT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateDebut).",";
00545         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_FIN."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDate($dateFin).",";
00546         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_TECHNO."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($techno)).",";
00547         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_ETUDIANT_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject($nbEtudiantProp).",";
00548         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_INDEMNITE_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($indemniteProp)).",";
00549         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ETAT."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($etat)).",";
00550         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MOTIF_REFUS."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($motifRefus)).",";
00551         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_MAIL_RESPONSABLE_PROPOSITION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processString(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($mailResponsableProposition)).",";
00552         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_PROMO."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($promo).",";
00553         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_CREATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateCreation).",";
00554         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_DERNIERE_MODIFICATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateDerniereModification).",";
00555         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_VALIDATION."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateValidation).",";
00556         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_REFUS."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateRefus).",";
00557         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DATE_TERMINAISON."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->computeDateTime($dateTerminaison).",";
00558         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_DESC_TECHNO_PROP."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processObject(DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($descTechnoProp)).",";
00559         $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_ENTREPRISE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($idEntreprise).", ";
00560                 $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_CANDIDATURE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($nbCandidature).", ";
00561                 $sql .= DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_NB_FICHE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($nbFiche)."";
00562         
00563         $sql .= " WHERE 1";
00564         $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($this->_idPropositionStage);
00565         
00566         DBConnector::getDBConnector()->executeQuery($sql);
00567         
00568         $this->_idMaitreStage = $idMaitreStage;
00569         $this->_idContact = $idContact;
00570         $this->_domaine = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($domaine);
00571         $this->_intitule = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($intitule);
00572         $this->_sujet = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($sujet);
00573         $this->_dateDebut = $dateDebut;
00574         $this->_dateFin = $dateFin;
00575         $this->_techno = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($techno);
00576         $this->_nbEtudiantProp = $nbEtudiantProp;
00577         $this->_indemniteProp = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($indemniteProp);
00578         $this->_etat = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($etat);
00579         $this->_motifRefus = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($motifRefus);
00580         $this->_mailResponsableProposition = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($mailResponsableProposition);
00581         $this->_promo = $promo;
00582         $this->_dateCreation = $dateCreation;
00583         $this->_dateDerniereModification = $dateDerniereModification;
00584         $this->_dateValidation = $dateValidation;
00585         $this->_dateRefus = $dateRefus;
00586         $this->_dateTerminaison = $dateTerminaison;
00587         $this->_descTechnoProp = DBConnector::getDBConnector()->echapString($descTechnoProp);
00588         $this->_idEntreprise = $idEntreprise;
00589         $this->_nbCandidature = $nbCandidature;
00590         $this->_nbFiche = $nbFiche;
00591                 
00592     }

00599         public  function deleteRecord(){
00600         $sql = "DELETE FROM ".DBPropositionStage::$TABLE_NAME." WHERE 1";
00601         $sql .= " AND ".DBPropositionStage::$FIELD_ID_PROPOSITION_STAGE."=".DBConnector::getDBConnector()->processInt($this->_idPropositionStage);
00602         
00603         DBConnector::getDBConnector()->executeQuery($sql);
00604     }

00626     public static function addPropositionStage($entreprise,$maitreStage, $contact, $domaine, $intitule, $sujet, $dateDebut, $dateFin, $techno, $descTechnoProp,$nbEtudiantProp, $indemniteProp,$mailRespProp){
00627             return DBPropositionStage::createRecord(
00628                                             $maitreStage,
00629                                             $contact,
00630                                             $domaine,
00631                                             $intitule,
00632                                             $sujet,
00633                                             $dateDebut,
00634                                             $dateFin,
00635                                             $techno,
00636                                             $nbEtudiantProp,
00637                                             $indemniteProp,
00638                                             DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_ATTENTE_VALIDATION,//état
00639                                             "",// motif refus
00640                                             $mailRespProp, // mail du responsable de la proposition
00641                                             DBConfig::getConfigValue("ANNEE PROMO"),                      //promo
00642                                             date("d/m/Y H:i:s"),               //date de création
00643                                             "",   //date de dernière modification
00644                                             "",             //date de validation
00645                                             "",                  //date de refus
00646                                             "",            //date de terminaison
00647                                             $descTechnoProp,
00648                                             $entreprise
00649                                             );
00650     }
00651 
00657     public static function supprimerPropositionsSansTypeDeStage(){
00658         $propositionsSupprimees = 0;
00659 
00660         // Récupération de toutes les propositions existantes
00661         foreach(DBPropositionStage::getRecords() as $proposition){
00662             // Si aucun lien dans la table proposition_concerne, la proposition n'a aucun type de stage => on la supprime
00663             if(count(DBConcerne::getRecords("", $proposition->getIdPropositionStage())) == 0){
00664                 $proposition->deleteRecord();
00665                 $propositionsSupprimees += 1;
00666             }
00667         }
00668         
00669         return $propositionsSupprimees;
00670     }

00677         public function updatePropositionAvecAttr() {
00678       $this->updateRecord(
00679       $this->_idMaitreStage,
00680       $this->_idContact,
00681       $this->_domaine,
00682       $this->_intitule,
00683       $this->_sujet,
00684       $this->_dateDebut,
00685       $this->_dateFin,
00686       $this->_techno,
00687       $this->_nbEtudiantProp,
00688       $this->_indemniteProp,
00689       $this->_etat,
00690       $this->_motifRefus,
00691       $this->_mailResponsableProposition,
00692       $this->_promo,
00693       $this->_dateCreation,
00694       $this->_dateDerniereModification,
00695       $this->_dateValidation,
00696       $this->_dateRefus,
00697       $this->_dateTerminaison,
00698       $this->_descTechnoProp,
00699       $this->_idEntreprise,
00700           $this->_nbCandidature,
00701           $this->_nbFiche
00702           );
00703 
00704     }

00706         
00712         public function setEtatProposition($etat) {
00713         $this->_etat = $etat;
00714         switch ($this->_etat) {
00715         case DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_ATTENTE_VALIDATION:
00716             break;
00717         case DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_VALIDEE:
00718             $this->_dateValidation=date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00719             break;
00720         case DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_REFUSEE:
00721             $this->_dateRefus=date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00722             break;
00723         case DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_TERMINEE:
00724             $this->_dateTerminaison=date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00725             break;
00726         }
00727         $this->_dateDerniereModification=date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00728         $this->updatePropositionAvecAttr();
00729        
00730         // Envoi du mail au responsable
00731         if($this->_etat == DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_VALIDEE)
00732             $this->envoiMailResponsableValidation();
00733         if($this->_etat == DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_REFUSEE)
00734             $this->envoiMailResponsableRefus();
00735 
00736         // Envoi de mail aux étudiants pouvant être intéressés par la propositions
00737         if($this->_etat == DBPropositionStage::$ETAT_PROPOSITION_STAGE_VALIDEE)
00738             $this->mailEtudiantsInteresses();
00739    }
00740    
00746         public function setMotifRefus($motif) {
00747        $this->_motifRefus = $motif;
00748        $this->_dateDerniereModification=date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00749        $this->updatePropositionAvecAttr();
00750 
00751    }

00753         
00759         public function getEntreprise(){
00760         $entreprises = DBEntreprise::getRecords($this->_idEntreprise);
00761         if(count($entreprises) == 0) return null;
00762         else{
00763             assert(count($entreprises) == 1);
00764             return $entreprises[0];
00765         }
00766     }

00783     public function updatePropositionStage($domaine,$intitule,$sujet,$dateDebut,$dateFin,$techno,$descTechno,$nbEtudiant,$indemnite,$emailRespProp) {
00784 
00785         $this->_domaine = $domaine;
00786         $this->_intitule = $intitule;
00787         $this->_sujet = $sujet;
00788         $this->_dateDebut = $dateDebut;
00789         $this->_dateFin = $dateFin;
00790         $this->_techno = $techno;
00791         $this->_nbEtudiantProp = $nbEtudiant;
00792         $this->_indemniteProp = $indemnite;
00793         $this->_mailResponsableProposition = $emailRespProp;
00794         $this->_descTechnoProp = $descTechno;
00795 
00796         $this->_dateDerniereModification = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00797 
00798         $this->updatePropositionAvecAttr();
00799 
00800     }

00806         public function incrementeNbCandidature() {
00807                 $this->_nbCandidature++ ;
00808         }

00814         public function incrementeNbFiche() {
00815                 $this->_nbFiche++ ;

00817         
00822     public function mailEtudiantsInteresses(){
00823         // Récupération de tous les étudiants de l'année en cours
00824         $etudiants = DBEtudiant::getRecords("", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", DBConfig::getConfigValue("ANNEE PROMO"));
00825         foreach($etudiants as $etd){
00826 
00827             // On regarde si l'étudiant est dans la MIAGe visée par la proposition
00828             $etdVise = false;
00829             $miageEtd = $etd->getMiageEtudiant();
00830             $typesMiageConcernes = DBConcerne::getRecords("", $this->_idPropositionStage);
00831             $i=0;
00832             while((!$etdVise) && ($i < count($typesMiageConcernes))){
00833                 $etdVise = ($miageEtd == $typesMiageConcernes[$i]->getTypeStage()->getMiage());
00834                 $i++;
00835             }
00836 
00837             // Si l'étudiant n'est pas visé, on retourne en début de boucle
00838             if(!$etdVise)
00839                 continue;
00840             // On regarde si l'étudiant est déjà lié a une fiche de stage : auquel cas il ne sera pas intéressé par la proposition
00841             if(count(DBFicheStage::getRecords("", "", "", "", $etd->getIdEtudiant())) != 0)
00842                 continue;
00843             $adresseMail = "";
00844             if($etd->getMailfacEtudiant() != "")
00845                 $adresseMail .= (($adresseMail == "")?"":",").$etd->getMailfacEtudiant();
00846             if($etd->getMailstableEtudiant() != "")
00847                 $adresseMail .= (($adresseMail == "")?"":",").$etd->getMailstableEtudiant();
00848             if($etd->getMailstageEtudiant() != "")
00849                 $adresseMail .= (($adresseMail == "")?"":",").$etd->getMailstageEtudiant();
00850                 
00851             // Si l'étudiant a un mail invalide, on n'envoie rien
00852             if($adresseMail == "")
00853                 continue;
00854             
00855             // Si on arrive ici, l'étudiant est "concerné" par la proposition de stage !
00856             $m = new Mailer(DBPropositionStage::$NOTIFICATION_PROPOSITION_ETD);
00857             $m->fillTemplateVar("nom_etudiant", $etd->getNomEtudiant());
00858             $m->fillTemplateVar("prenom_etudiant", $etd->getPrenomEtudiant());
00859             $m->fillTemplateVar("intitule_stage", $this->_intitule);
00860             $m->fillTemplateVar("raison_sociale_etp", $this->getEntreprise()->getRaisonsocialeEntreprise());
00861             $m->fillTemplateVar("sujet_stage", $this->_sujet);
00862             $m->fillTemplateVar("technologie_stage", $this->_techno);
00863             $m->fillTemplateVar("description_technologie", $this->_descTechnoProp);
00864             $m->fillTemplateVar("indemnite_stage", $this->_indemniteProp);
00865             
00866             $m->sendMail($adresseMail, "stages_miage@miage.emi.u-bordeaux1.fr", DBConfig::getConfigValue("MAIL ADMINISTRATEURS"), "Proposition de stage MIAGe");
00867         }
00868     }
00869     
00875         private function envoiMailResponsableValidation(){
00876         $m = new Mailer(DBPropositionStage::$MAILVALIDATIONPROPSTAGE_TEMPLATE);
00877 
00878         $contacts=DBContactEtp::getRecords($this->_idContact);
00879         $contact=$contacts[0];
00880 
00881         $m->fillTemplateVar("nom_contact", $contact->getNomContact());
00882         $m->fillTemplateVar("prenom_contact", $contact->getPrenomContact());
00883         $m->fillTemplateVar("intitule", $this->_intitule);
00884 
00885         $concernes=DBConcerne::getRecords("",$this->_idPropositionStage);
00886 
00887         $listeTypeStage="";
00888         foreach($concernes as $concerne)
00889         {
00890             $cs=DBTypeStage::getRecords($concerne->getIdTypeStage());
00891             $c=$cs[0];
00892             if($listeTypeStage!="")
00893              $listeTypeStage=$listeTypeStage . ",". $c->getLibelleTypeStage();
00894             else
00895              $listeTypeStage=$listeTypeStage . $c->getLibelleTypeStage();
00896         }
00897         $m->fillTemplateVar("types_stage", $listeTypeStage);
00898         return $m->sendMail($this->_mailResponsableProposition, "stages_miage@miage.emi.u-bordeaux1.fr", DBConfig::getConfigValue("MAIL ADMINISTRATEURS"), "Site MIAGe des stages ");
00899     }
00900     
00906         private function envoiMailResponsableRefus(){
00907         $m = new Mailer(DBPropositionStage::$MAILREFUSPROPSTAGE_TEMPLATE);
00908 
00909         $contacts=DBContactEtp::getRecords($this->_idContact);
00910         $contact=$contacts[0];
00911 
00912         $m->fillTemplateVar("nom_contact", $contact->getNomContact());
00913         $m->fillTemplateVar("prenom_contact", $contact->getPrenomContact());
00914         $m->fillTemplateVar("motif_refus", $this->_motifRefus);
00915         $m->fillTemplateVar("intitule", $this->_intitule);
00916 
00917         $concernes=DBConcerne::getRecords("",$this->_idPropositionStage);
00918 
00919         $listeTypeStage="";
00920         foreach($concernes as $concerne)
00921         {
00922             $cs=DBTypeStage::getRecords($concerne->getIdTypeStage());
00923             $c=$cs[0];
00924             if($listeTypeStage!="")
00925              $listeTypeStage=$listeTypeStage . ",". $c->getLibelleTypeStage();
00926             else
00927              $listeTypeStage=$listeTypeStage . $c->getLibelleTypeStage();
00928         }
00929         $m->fillTemplateVar("types_stage", $listeTypeStage);
00930         return $m->sendMail($this->_mailResponsableProposition, "stages_miage@miage.emi.u-bordeaux1.fr", DBConfig::getConfigValue("MAIL ADMINISTRATEURS"), "Site MIAGe des stages ");
00931     }
00932     
00938         public function notificationAdministrateurAjout(){
00939         $m = new Mailer(DBPropositionStage::$NOTIFICATION_ADMIN_TEMPLATE);
00940 
00941         $m->fillTemplateVar("raison_sociale_etp", $this->getEntreprise()->getRaisonsocialeEntreprise());
00942         $m->fillTemplateVar("intitule_proposition", $this->_intitule);
00943         $m->fillTemplateVar("description_proposition", $this->_sujet);
00944 
00945         return $m->sendMail(DBConfig::getConfigValue("MAIL ADMINISTRATEURS"), "stages_miage@miage.emi.u-bordeaux1.fr", DBConfig::getConfigValue("MAIL ADMINISTRATEURS"), "Site MIAGe des stages : Ajout d'une proposition");
00946     }
